info.name: HealthEnviron Mobile App API
info.description:
API to manage the logistics of scanned products from different suppliers.

Contact Support CORNERSTONE Blockchain Solutions S.A.S <info@cornerstonesln.com>.

# Authentication
To get access this API you have an account with [Medtronic](https://medtronic.healthenviron.com). After sign in successful in every other request you make in this API you have to pass API Auth and Request Caller for authentication.

# Status Codes & Errors
Failed requests will always return an error response, including a response code and a message explaining the reason for the error.

| Response Code | Reason | Description |
|-|-|-|
| 2xx | 2xx responses indicate a successful request | The request that you made is valid and successful. |
| 4xx | 4xx responses indicate an error with the request | There was a problem with your request. |
| 5xx | 5xx responses indicate an error made by Barcode Scanning Platform. | An error occurred when Barcode Scanning Platform attempted to processes it. |

> If your request is succesfully completed then you get **response** along with *status*=**2xx**.

> If your request is not completed or have error you get multiple **errors** in an array along with *status*=**4xx** or **5xx**.

exec: pm.test("Response time is less than 3s", function () {

request.description:
# Member Authentication. This endpoint allows you to authenticate and get an API Key associated with the authenticated member. **Note:** if you want to authenticate a member belonging to a clinic & hospital, you must specify the `clinicId` field in the body of the request Additionally, you must send the "password" or the "apiAuth" to authenticate | Field | Type | Description | Required Field | |-|-|-|-| | email | string | The email address used to login.
**format:** email | required | | password | string | The password used to login.
**minLength:** 6 | optional | | apiAuth | string | The api auth used to login. | optional | | clinicId | integer | This ID represents a Clinic & Hospital. Including a clinicId in your request allows you to log in with a clinic hospital department user.
**minimum:** 1 | optional |

Unauthorized - You must send the "password" or the "apiAuth" to authenticate
OK - Successfully logged in

item.name: Clinics & Hospital

query.description: Clinic & Hospital ID (optional).

request.description:
# Get Clinic & Hospital.
You can use the `/get-clinic-hospital` endpoint to retrieve a specific clinic & hospital from the database.

**Note:** if you want to get a specific clinic & hospital, you must specify the `clinicId` query parameter.

| Authorized Member Groups |
|-|
| Clinical Specialist. |
| Clinic & Hospital Department. |

response.name: Not Found - No clinic found in the database
OK - Successfully retrieved clinic hospital

item.name: Member

request.description:
# Create a new Member. You can use the `/create-member` endpoint to create a new member in the database. | Authorized Member Groups | |-| | All. | | Field | Type | Description | Required Field | |-|-|-|-| | email | string | The email address.
**format:** email | required | | password | string | The password used to login.
**minLength:** 6 | required | | fName | string | The first name. | required | | lName | string | The last name. | required | | bidCurrency | string | The bid currency. | required | | otherSystemReference | string | The other system reference ID: SAP System Reference ID. | optional | | companyName | string | The company name. | required | | origin | string | The address Google. | required | | address | string | The address. | required | | originPostalCode | string | The zip code. | required | | originLocality | string | The city. | required | | originSublocalityLevel2 | string | The district. | required | | originAdministrativeAreaLevel1 | string | The state. | required | | originAdministrativeAreaLevel1Short | string | The state ISO 2. | required | | originCountry | string | The country. | required | | originCountryShort | string | The country ISO 2. | required | | originLat | string | The latitude. | required | | originLng | string | The longitude. | required | | contactno | string | The contact number. | required | | fax | string | The fax number. | optional | | databaseName | string | The database name. | required |

**options:** up, down, main | required | | groupSlug | array[string] | The group slug array value to only get those type of user that you want.

**uniqueItems** | optional |

request.description:
# Create a new Incoming Scanned Batch Non HealthEnviron. You can use the `/create-incoming-scanned-batch-non-healthenviron` endpoint to create a new incoming scanned batch non healthenviron from a provider. | Authorized Member Groups | Authorized Account Type | |-|-| | Clinic & Hospital Department | Receiver, Administrator | | Field | Type | Description | Required Field | |-|-|-|-| | orderNumber | string | This order number can be any data entered by the clinic & hospital department receiver. | required | | barcodes | array[object] | An array of product barcodes.
**minItems**: 1
**uniqueItems** | required | | object.code | string | The product barcode.
**minLength:** 27 | required | | object.qty | integer | The quantity of products.
**minimum:** 1 | required | | placeCode | string | This code represents a Clinic & Hospital Place ID. | required |

request.description:
# Create a new Scanned Batch Non HealthEnviron. You can use the `/create-scanned-batch-non-healthenviron` endpoint to create a new scanned batch non healthenviron from a provider. | Authorized Member Groups | Authorized Account Type | |-|-| | Clinic & Hospital Department | Consumer, Administrator | | Field | Type | Description | Required Field | |-|-|-|-| | patientNumber | string | Either you can provide system patient id or patient reference number from clinic & hospital. | required | | barcodes | array[object] | An array of product barcodes.
**minItems**: 1
**uniqueItems** | required | | object.code | string | The product barcode.
**minLength:** 27 | required | | object.qty | integer | The quantity of products.
**minimum:** 1 | required | | placeCode | string | This code represents a Clinic & Hospital Place ID. | required | | orderType | string | This code represents a Order Type Code. | required |

request.description:
# Check a product from Inventory.
You can use the `/check-product` endpoint to check and retrieve a specific product from the database.

| Authorized Member Groups | Authorized Account Type |

request.description:
# Modify a Scanned Batch. You can use the `/modify-scanned-batch` endpoint to modify scanned batch in the database. | Authorized Member Groups | Authorized Account Type | |-|-| | Clinic & Hospital Department | Consumer, Administrator | | Field | Type | Description | Required Field | |-|-|-|-| | patientNumber | string | Either you can provide system patient id or patient reference number from clinic & hospital. | required | | barcodes | array[object] | An array of product barcodes.
**minItems**: 1
**uniqueItems** | required | | object.code | string | The product barcode.
**minLength:** 27 | required | | object.qty | integer | The quantity of products.
**minimum:** 1 | required | | placeCode | string | This code represents a Clinic & Hospital Place ID. | required | | orderType | string | This code represents a Order Type Code.
**options:** UWC | required |

response.name: Forbidden - Unauthorized access token
Method Not Allowed - Only PUT requests are accepted
Internal Server Error - An error occurred while undoing scanned batch
Forbidden - Permission denied
OK - Successfully modified scanned batch
Not Found - The scanned batch does not exist or was undone
Internal Server Error - An error occurred while creating a new scanned batch
Unprocessable Entity - Missing required body parameters

request.description:
# Undo a Scanned Batch. You can use the `/undo-scanned-batch` endpoint to undo a scanned batch. | Authorized Member Groups | Authorized Account Type | |-|-| | Clinic & Hospital Department | Consumer, Administrator | | Field | Type | Description | Required Field | |-|-|-|-| | batchId | string | This ID represents a Scanned Batch ID. | required | | orderType | string | The order type code.
**options:** UWC | required | | patientNumber | string | Either you can provide system patient id or patient reference number from clinic & hospital. | required |

response.name: Internal Server Error - Unable to update scanned batch
Internal Server Error - Unable to get scanned batch id
Internal Server Error - An error occurred while retrieving relations id
Unprocessable Entity - Missing required body parameters
Internal Server Error - An error occurred while retrieving patient
OK - Successfully undone scanned batch
Not Found - The scanned batch does not exist or was undone
Forbidden - Permission denied
Method Not Allowed - Only PUT requests are accepted
Internal Server Error - An error occurred while trying to update the scanned batch
Forbidden - Unauthorized access token
OK - Successfully undone scanned batch Copy

item.description: You can check if the patient has been scanned, check if the product has been scanned, create a new AMS scanned batch, create a new incoming scanned batch, create a new incoming SRAI scanned batch, create a new return scanned batch, create a new scanned batch, create a new SRAI scanned batch, retrieve the list of scanned batches by patient, modify a scanned batch or undo a scanned batch.

request.description:
# Send an email using SendGrid.

This Lambda Function allows you send an email using SendGrid.

| Authorized Member Groups |
|-|
| All. |

| Field | Type | Description |
|-|-|-|
| content | object | Handlebar substitutions. |
| attachments | array[object] | An array of objects in which you can specify any attachments you want to include. |
| to | array[object] | An array of recipients. Each object within this array may contain the name, but must always contain the email, of a recipient. |
| from | string | The from email address used to deliver the email. |
| sitename | string | The site name of origin. |
| template | string | The id of a template that you would like to use. |

response.name: Unprocessable Entity - Missing required body parameters
Unauthorized - SendGrid API key not provided
